comment: Very smooth with a great afterburn
Thin sharp wood flavor, mild sweetness. Lots of burn.
For an inexpensive option, this was a very smooth bourbon with mild sweetness.

A Barton Distillery bourbon that is bottled at The Founders Company,  Louisville,  Kentucky. It does have an age statement of 3 years. It has an light amber color and a sweet smell. It has sweet taste with not much of a follow up. A cheaper whiskey that is still worth drinking.
